name: CATCH THE BADDIEZ [AGBIC 2017 Ver.]
description:
OH NO! The Baddiez Boyz are terrorizing St. Niceville!

 It's up to you to save the town from them. Catch them using you trusted Justice Police Mobile (JTC)!

Shoot and Destroy The Baddiez Boyz using... some yellow pellet by pressing Z!

This is my "A Game by Its Cover 2017" submission, based on "GETAWAY TO NOWHERE" famicase by Katayama Nakamura.

http://famicase.com/12/softs/61.html 

All cars assets (except the boss) are from Voxel Cars Prototype by Hippo

https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/79163
